text: We live right next door and we go at least once a week, great chicken , the slaw and piri piri sauce is so good. but the best thing is the chicken salad sandwich with homemade BBQ sauce is amazing. The guys at the counter are so nice . A+++++
Very good experience that will surely be repeated. Everything was good even the somewhat spicy chicken dip!
Prix raisonable pour un gouteux repas portugais, surtout pour emporter, juste quelques bancs sur place. Salades et riz disponible etc.
